Footer.description: Design office for your construction plans

hero.title: Your Vision, Our Expertise
hero.subtitle: We specialize in architectural design and comprehensive project services. From initial concept to final realization - achieve your construction goals with us.

services.title: Comprehensive Project Services
services.subtitle: From architectural designs to complete project documentation. We approach each project individually with emphasis on quality and functionality.

items.title: Architectural Design
items.description: Creative designs of modern and functional buildings that meet your requirements and harmoniously fit into the surrounding environment.

items.title: Project Planning
items.description: Complete project work from studies through building permit documentation to implementation documentation.

items.title: Construction Documentation
items.description: Professional preparation of documentation for authorities, investors and contractors in accordance with current legislation.

items.title: 3D Visualization
items.description: Photorealistic visualizations and 3D models for better understanding of your future project before construction begins.

items.title: Renovations
items.description: Expert solutions for renovations, modernizations and reconstructions of buildings including heritage-protected structures.

items.title: Consulting
items.description: Professional advice and consultation at every stage of the project from initial concept to final realization.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Maxprojekty?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We've been here for you for over 12 years. Our experience, professionalism and individual approach guarantee the success of your project.

reasons.title: Expertise & Experience
reasons.description: More than a decade of experience in architectural and construction project design.

reasons.title: Individual Approach
reasons.description: Each project is unique to us. We give it maximum attention and care.

reasons.title: Modern Technology
reasons.description: We use the latest technology and software to create precise projects.

reasons.title: Comprehensive Services
reasons.description: Under one roof, we offer everything from design to complete project documentation.

reasons.title: Meeting Deadlines
reasons.description: We respect your time requirements and meet agreed implementation deadlines.

reasons.title: Transparent Communication
reasons.description: We keep you informed throughout the project and are always available for your questions.

references.title: Our Successful Projects
references.subtitle: Take a look at a selection of our completed projects. Each represents our expertise and creative approach to solving construction challenges.

finalCta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
finalCta.subtitle: Don't hesitate to contact us for a free consultation. Together we'll find the best solution for your construction needs and realize your vision.

Projects.title: Our projects
Projects.intro: Browse selected projects we worked on. We specialize in architectural design and project services for all types of buildings – from family houses to large commercial complexes.

About.title: About us

meta.title: About us | MaxProjekty
meta.description: Meet the MaxProjekty team, our history, vision and values. A design office focused on quality, innovation and responsibility.

About.subtitle: Meet our team, values and vision.

history.title: Our History
history.text: Maxprojekty was founded in 2010 with the vision to provide comprehensive design services at the highest level. Over more than a decade, we have successfully completed hundreds of projects of various sizes.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: We strive for the highest standards of quality in all our projects, follow the latest trends and technologies in architecture and construction, and approach every project with maximum responsibility.

value1.title: Quality
value1.text: We care about the highest quality standards in all our projects.

value2.title: Innovation
value2.text: We follow the latest trends and technologies in architecture and construction.

value3.title: Responsibility
value3.text: We approach every project with maximum responsibility.

member1.name: Ing. Jan Novák
member1.bio: Expert in project management and technical supervision.

member2.name: Ing. Marie Svobodová
member2.bio: Specialist in architectural design and visualization.

member3.name: Ing. Petr Dvořák
member3.bio: Responsible for structural solutions and construction processes.

member4.name: Ing. Anna Černá
member4.bio: Coordinates projects and communication with clients.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to bring clients innovative, sustainable and high-quality solutions in building design. We see every project as an opportunity to create value for society and future generations.

quotes.author: Jan Kovář, investor
quotes.text: Cooperation with MaxProjekty was professional and smooth.

quotes.author: Petra Malá, developer
quotes.text: I appreciate the innovative approach and communication of the team.

cta.title: Join our team!
cta.text: We are looking for new colleagues who want to participate in interesting projects.
